  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(String title, int year, String director, double rating, int genre)
      Instantiates a Movie object.
      Parameters:
      title - Movie title.
      year - Year of release.
      director - Name of director.
      rating - Rating of 1 - 10 from IMDB.
      genre - Number representing Movie genre.

  • Method Details

    • genresMenu

      public static String genresMenu()
      Creates a string of movie genres in the format: 
           0: science fiction
     1: fantasy
     2: drama
    ...
    10: mystery
      Returns:
      A formatted numbered string of Movie genres.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Movie target)
      Movies are compared by title, then by year if the titles match. Must ignore case. Ex: Zulu, 1964 precedes Zulu, 2013. Returns:
      • 0 if this equals target
      • < 0 if this precedes target
      • > 0 if this follows target
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Movie>

    • genreToName

      public String genreToName()
      Converts a genre integer to a string.
      Returns:
      The string version of the genre number.
